sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Box, TextField, Button, styled} from '@mui/material' //Box is basically a div substitute in Material UI. it has sx prop which is inline styling without css files. Box = div + styling + theme + convenience //styled in MUI is just “making your own component(customBox) with CSS attached to it. Instead of writing styles again and again, you lock them once and reuse //every time I call custonBox styled component it will have these CSS const customBox = styled(Box)` width: 40px margin: auto box-shadow: 5px ` const Login = () => { const imageURL = 'https://www.sesta.it/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/logo-blog-sesta-trasparente.png' return ( ) } export default Login
